# nat-avatar

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                | Type                   | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `alt`    | `alt`     | Alternative text for the image                             | `string`               | `''`        |
| `name`   | `name`    | Name used to generate initials when image is not available | `string`               | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the avatar                                         | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`      |
| `src`    | `src`     | Image source URL                                           | `string`               | `undefined` |
